Text:
heyy sora fan, i only just downloaded a psp emulator just for this game and im not sure how to work it properly
im guessing i dont have the custom firmware (whateva that is O.o)
can u help me?

I made an account just to comment on this torrent. I've tried many times to patch this game to no avail...and I've tried to find well, something like this.

I will seed this for as long as I can and you have my respect and appreciation from the bottom of my heart, man.
To Flame2032:I really don't know how it works on psp emulator, i only have a real psp and i've never tried it at the emultaor, so i'm really sorry,but i can see what i can find :D
To MrOutside: I'm really glad it worked and i hope ypu enjoy the game and the series. I really love kingdom Hearts :)
IT WORKS!!!!!!! I've been looking for this iso for ages and none has worked, except this one :DD I will seed this. I will never stop seeding. You are my savior, thank you!
Works perfectly so far on Custom firmware Pro b-10, running on PSPGO. Just too bad the X and O and switched, but that's the least. Awesome job.
Thanks everyone, glad my work is appreciated :)

I made an account just for this torrent as well. I've played KHFM and KH2FM on my modded PS2, but I don't know how to go about putting this on a PSP. Do you think you could walk me through it, or send me somewhere that can? I love this series and it would be very much appreciated.

To RexAeneas here is a link on how to get custom firmaware on your psp: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7284855/Custom_Firmware_For_PSP just follow the instructions in description. Then you just make a folder in your psp and name it iso. Then put the game cso in the iso folder you just made.
tried it on 5.50 gen d3 and just crashes :/
To xero13: Do just like what is said on the comment above yours. That is another custom firmware that i know it works on :D
hi i need step by step help on how to be able to use this on my psp man :(

To crislan22: Here is a link. A step by step guide so you can get custom firmware on your psp. If you want to know how to play ISOs or CSOs just search on youtube. http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7284855/Custom_Firmware_For_PSP. Hope this help :D
Where do I put the CSO-file?
nevermind, I just had to create a folder called "ISO" (if anybody else wondered)
Glad you found out!! ;)
this iso work in all CFW?

i tried this game on my PSP 1000 Phat. 
5.50 Prome-4 . but it Crash :(. i only saw Black Screen. Help me Please . ASAP. or Give me Better custom firmware Please. Thanks
I have a problem with hitting enemies. I hit them and my attacks dont do anything. Iy happens frequently and makes the game unplayable. Anyone else have this issue?

If you guys check the comments above there is a link to the custom firmware that works for this game and i think it actually works for the most games too ;) hope this help :) Thegameksk: if you don't have the custom firmware in the description i recomend that you download it, and have you tried pressing the o button? x and o button have been switched :D

Thanks for the pre-patched game.

Just wondering what version of the English patch did you use?
I used the 1.0.12. It's the newest one :D
Is there a Japanese version of the torrent? Would like to play without the patch.

This torrent is awesome just started seeding it myself for as long as i can afford to, my buds and I have been trying to get this for a while well me find it for them, we only ran into one problem and thats random hangups during multiplayer gameplay though I believe reverting it to an ISO will fix that either way still pretty awesome
Thanks man :D hope your friends got happy too :)
